BackstoryDef.title: archotech creation
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a creation of an archotech mind. Though [PAWN_pronoun] claimed to have originated from a glitterworld family, [PAWN_pronoun] was actually birthed into this world already an adult, with seemingly rather impressive characteristics. It's unknown where [PAWN_nameDef] got [PAWN_possessive] fake childhood stories from.
